alert.note: Alert for Greene; Sullivan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 27 at 3:05AM EDT until July 28 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Indiana, including the following counties, Greene and Sullivan. * WHEN...Until 900 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 305 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Linton, Bloomfield, Lyons, Switz City, Newberry and Pleasantville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
